item.title: Gloomsters or not? A Sentiment Analysis of MPs on Twitter
item.description: Ever wondered who is the most positive MP on Twitter? In this post, a data-driven approach is used to answer this question

item.title: Machine Learning in R with Tidymodels
item.description: A basic template for using Tidymodels for all your machine learning needs
